Document.TEXT: Baumer Ltd. Appoints New Controller Original Press Release Baumer Ltd. Appoints New Controller Press release date: January 12, 2016 Baumer Ltd. announced today that Mr. Christopher Gostebski has joined the company to lead from a financial perspective. Mr. Gostebski comes to Baumer via Stanley Black Decker as well as United Technologies, Pratt Whitney division, where he held various positions in Accounting, Finance, Analysis, and Supply Chain Management. Mr. Gostebski's education comes via Hartford University and Central Connecticut State University, and the Baumer Group excited to have him on our team. Further information: www.baumer.com/us-en Baumer Group The Baumer Group is one of the worldwide leading manufacturers of sensors, encoders, measuring instruments and components for automated image-processing. Baumer combines innovative technologies and customer-oriented service into intelligent solutions for factory and process automation and offers an unrivalled wide technology and product portfolio. With around 2,300 employees and 38 subsidiaries in 19 countries, the family-owned group of companies is always close to the customer. Baumer provides clients in most diverse industries with vital benefits and measurable added value by worldwide consistent high quality standards and outstanding innovative potential. Learn more at www.baumer.com on the internet. Jeremy Jones Marketing Communications Baumer Ltd.
